recipesJson.name: Milk of the Poppy by Vapetasia #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of Vapetasia's Milk of the Poppy
The Profile is a Dragonfruit, Strawberry, Whipped Cream eliquid
Made on Live Mixing

reviews.text: It's great how the 5% Dragonfruit completely changes this from a strawberries & cream base to something entirely different. I'd say vape this after 3 days, and try to not let it sit for long because the flavors do mute. Shouldn't be a problem since this is a delicious mix.

The smell on this stuff is amazing. The strawberries mix well with the whipped cream, with the dragonfruit actually being noticable, and giving everything a zing that just sets it off (opened up the mtl into partial DTL to get a real feel for the flavor). I'd say it's muted, but well, the original tasted that way to me as well, so you definitely nailed the hell outta it. As I love the original, I have to say job done, man. Nice one!
This is the first recipe I've tried with this much dragonfruit that I still enjoyed.
